modName: Skyrim Redone package for Chinese Simplified
summary: after many hours of work, the simplified-Chinese language patch for skyrim redone 0.99.21.2 has finished.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim redone is good, translation is needed. i swear i didn\'t change any original value in the mod. so, it\'s good for download.

Remember to install the original mod file, and then covered with this patch.

---------------------------------------
mod Original author: T3nd0s
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286
---------------------------------------

If you want to point out my translation errors, contact me, use a Thu\'um or leave a message here

mailbox: qincas@yahoo.com.cn
i am not sure the site allows write personal email address, or not?
author: Chao Chin
